name: Block Blast City
description:
With stunningly beautiful graphics and adorable Buddies, Block Blast City is a puzzle game for people who want a real challenge! Use your skill (and a little bit of luck) to win. If you’re tired of match 3 games but love puzzles you will love Block Blast City! Rotate, drop, clear lines, and collect all the Buddies!


Game Features:

A fresh, unique twist on block-dropping puzzles
Enjoy heartwarming, gorgeous graphics
Complete hundreds of custom made puzzles to enrich your mind
Master cute and challenging puzzle mechanics like the Sleepy Buddy, the Shellies or the Butterflies!
Get your Daily Treat! A helpful reward for you, every day!
Participate in the Star Tournament and win fabulous prizes!


Download Block Blast City for FREE and experience THE puzzle game for true puzzle fans. We think you’re going to love it!
